if you want to learn new language and become a patient human being, then you came to right game.
Free First Person shooter game. Has great physics, its the same physics as shooting a real gun, recoil, bloom, etc. Has competitive and casual.

Very fun game! I love Wingman, Competitive and Dangerzone, but the other modes feel a bit lacking. The community is pretty alright although some people take the game too seriously for my liking, but other than that i don't really have many complaints. Highly recommend trying it since it's free too.
